caption.p: Comparison of MBCs of Eucalyptus oil and its major component Citronellal. a to e: Comparison of MBC values of Eucalyptus oil and its major component citronellal, with antibiotics viz., ciprofloxacin, gentamicin, ampicillin, streptomycin and chloramphenicol respectively, against various Gram + and Gram –ve bacteria. The inverses of MBC values are represented in the figures to have a better presentation.
